content: {A笑眯眯}I'd like you to have this <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit: Bamboo Brooks</style>. It holds the most vivid scent and scenery in my memories.
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1010云果_云果

content: {A想象}Well mah, when I was really, really young, livin' in the bamboo grove on Zhuxi Mountain, the brook in front of our home would change colors throughout the seasons.
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1010云果_云果
